00030 //XXX also used by Ieee80211 to signal that a msg has been acked (must use an ID to identify msg!!!), and that channel was switched (msg==NULL then)
00031 class TxNotifDetails : public cPolymorphic
00032 {
00033   protected:
00034     cPacket *msg;
00035     InterfaceEntry *ie;
00036 
00037   public:
00038     TxNotifDetails() {msg=NULL; ie=NULL;}
00039 
00040     cPacket *getPacket() const {return msg;}
00041     InterfaceEntry *getInterfaceEntry() const {return ie;}
00042     void setPacket(cPacket *m) {msg = m;}
00043     void setInterfaceEntry(InterfaceEntry *e) {ie = e;}
00044 };
